songs.title: I’ve Told You Now (Live At St Pancras Old Church, London 2013)
songs.lyrics:
You know what i mean, it's like walking in the heat all day with no water
It's like waiting for a friend watching everybody else meet theirs on that corner
Or losing in an argument although you're right can't get your thoughts in order

Bridge:
Still I refrain, from talking at you, talking on, you know me well, I don't explain
But what the hell

Chorus:
Why do you think i come round here on my free will?
Wasting all my precious time
Oh the truth spills out, Ooh all I've told you now
You know what I mean
Although i try my best I still let down the team
You're everything i want
Why should i resist when you are there for me?
Bridge
Chorus
I've told you now x 3
Bridge
Chorus
